1114270.name: 1912 Titanic Mystery
1114270.description: A thrilling Hidden Object Adventure on board of the most famous ship in the world! A bomb was hidden aboard the Titanic II, a replica of the famous cruise ship! You are the sole person who can find where the bomb is concealed. Save the ship, and all aboard, during its maiden journey across the Atlantic Ocean. Search for hidden objects among original locations around the majestic ship to discover hidden diary entries and other clues to uncover the bomb`s location. Solve a century old mystery and save the ship and the passengers!
1114270.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
